subject: RXIL TREDS: Obligation due on {{settlementDate}}
body:
{{{header}}} Dear Sir/Madam,

Please find your obligations due on {{settlementDate}} with respect to your transaction on RXIL TREDS platform.
The total amount due on {{settlementDate}} is Rs {{obligationAmt}}. Details of the same is given in attachment.
Please ensure sufficient funds in the designated bank account.

{{{footer}}}
